name: Libra Nova
description: Next.js full-stack library management system with Firebase Authentication, MongoDB, role-based dashboards, and Stripe payments.
features: MongoDB integration for users and books
Role-based dashboard for User, Librarian, Admin
Stripe Payment Integration for purchasing books
benefits: Effortless book management for library admins
Users can track and review borrowed books
challenges: Handling SSR issues on Vercel and integrating multiple services together.
learnings: Learned Next.js server & client component mix, Firebase auth, MongoDB integration, and Stripe payments.

name: Tourism Flow
description: A full-stack tourism management system featuring booking, user roles, and admin controls.
features: User-friendly booking system with Firebase authentication
Admin dashboard for managing packages and bookings
benefits: Makes trip planning effortless for users through one platform
Helps admins manage tourism data and bookings efficiently
Improves transparency in pricing and user experience
challenges: Balancing multiple user roles and secure authentication flow.
learnings: Learned efficient state management with React and implemented secure JWT-based role access.

name: EduMates
description: MERN stack platform for group assignments, submission, and grading with JWT auth.
benefits: Encourages collaborative learning through shared assignments
Simplifies grading and feedback for teachers/examiners
Saves time with automated status updates for submissions
challenges: Handling dynamic filtering between examiner and student views was tricky.
learnings: Got hands-on with RESTful API structuring and protected routes in MERN.

name: Plant Care Tracker
description: Full CRUD plant care tracker built with React and Express, with personalized plant management.
features: Add, update, delete, and track plants
Dark/light theme toggle with global context
benefits: Helps plant owners organize and monitor plant care easily
Reduces overwatering or missed watering through reminders
Provides a personalized digital plant journal experience
challenges: Synchronizing real-time UI updates after CRUD operations.
learnings: Learned how to manage global state efficiently using Context and React Query.
